passage_text: About Rocko. Rodney Ramone Hill, Jr., better known as Rocko, is a rapper from the US. His net worth is estimated at $1 Million. His wealth comes from his career as a musician. He is also often referred to as Rocko da Don. Rocko was born in Atlanta, Georgia.

Rocko net worth: $1 Million. Rocko net worth: Rocko is an American rapper and actor who has a net worth of $1 million dollars. Rocko was born Rodney Ramone Hill, Jr. in Atlanta, Georgia in December 1979. He began his music career working as a ghostwriter and producer in the late 90s. After launching his own record label, Rocky Road Records, in 2002, he began writing and producing tracks for such artists as Young Dro and Dem Franchize Boyz.
Rocko net worth: Rocko is an American rapper and actor who has a net worth of $1 million dollars.

Follow @soundofthecity. Rocko is much more than the astronomical, controversial smash, U.O.E.N.O.. He's been around for years, having signed to Def Jam in 2006, but U.O.E.N.O. it. He's more than just a rapper, having signed Future years ago when his name was Meathead the Future, but you don't even know that either.
